snippet: A Chinese court is expected to issue a verdict on Monday in the murder trial of Gu Kailai, the wife of a prominent politician, who is reported to have all but confessed to killing a British businessman.
abstract: Chinese court is expected to issue a verdict soon in the murder trial of Bo Xilai's wife Gu Kailai, who is reported to have all but confessed to killing British businessman Neil Heywood.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese court is expected to issue a verdict on Monday in the murder trial of Gu Kailai, the wife of a prominent politician, who is reported to have all but confessed to killing a British businessman.

headline.seo: Verdict Due Monday in Chinese Murder Trial
headline.main: Verdict Due Monday in Chinese Murder Trial
headline.print_headline: China: Verdict Soon in Major Trial
